analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ

original: ca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati
hetu paccayā na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ

original: ca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekādasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke ekādasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
